reviewComments: Don't go out of your way to visit. It is a nice trail. One mile each way down some steps to a beautiful beach. If you are staying nearby like I was, it was a great way to walk... read more
A must see! Went to check out the marinas and kept going to the Heads. Pacific ocean, crashing waves, birds, deer.... perfect.
